tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ip_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    mac_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    threat_level INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE NetworkTrafficData (
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    destination_ip VARCHAR,
    protocol VARCHAR,
    packet_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkDevices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15),
    mac_address VARCHAR(17),
    last_seen TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkTraffic (
    traffic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    protocol VARCHAR(10),
    traffic_type VARCHAR(20),
    data_amount INT,
    traffic_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES NetworkDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityAlerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    threat_level VARCHAR(10),
    description TEXT,
    alert_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES NetworkDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic (
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    data_size INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE NetworkDevices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15),
    mac_address VARCHAR(17),
    connection_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE TrafficLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    protocol VARCHAR(10),
    action VARCHAR(10),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES NetworkDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityThreats (
    threat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    threat_type VARCHAR(50),
    threat_level VARCHAR(10),
    description TEXT,
    detected_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (log_id) REFERENCES TrafficLogs(log_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MitigationActions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_id INT,
    action_type VARCHAR(20),
    action_status VARCHAR(15),
    action_description TEXT,
    taken_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (threat_id) REFERENCES SecurityThreats(threat_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    password VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    role VARCHAR(20)
);
